title: Rito Plz. New Gamemode - OFAURF (aka "special" urf)
body:
So I thought up a new game mode that ritoe could implement into the game and its called
OFAURF

One for all - Ultra rapid fire =)

Rito send me the money through paypal @ritoideasforgamemodes
min pay of 100,000,000 
Thank you.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
I'm pretty sure this idea has been said multiple times before. But it would be cool anyways.

Still, wish they would just give us normal URF.
